sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent"> <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <always_available>false</always_available> <category/> <fallback>false</fallback> <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session> <keyword>CreateIncidentIntro</keyword> <name>Create an incident (Intro/Get name)</name> <next_intent>8e95b24edb5db200d1a9f1351d9619d4</next_intent> <order/> <output_speech_format/> <reprompt_speech_format/> <script><![CDATA[(function(content){ var erb = new EchoResponseBuilder(); erb.setOutputSpeech("PlainText", "Okay. Tell me your name. Start by saying 'My name is...' followed by your name. Or say 'Nevermind' to exit.", ""); erb.setReprompt("PlainText", "I didn't catch that. What is your name? Start by saying 'My name is...' followed by your name.", ""); erb.setEnd(false); result = erb.getResponse(); })(content);]]></script> <slot_name_1/> <slot_name_2/> <slot_name_3/> <slot_type_1/> <slot_type_2/> <slot_type_3/> <sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-03-06 03:43:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>cea5764edb5db200d1a9f1351d9619db</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jc</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 02:02:30</sys_updated_on> <top_level_intent>false</top_level_intent> </x_snc_amazon_echo_intent> </record_update>
